remarks: Condition implying membership in a projective subspace sum. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddfval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddfval.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
elpaddri $p |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ X C_ A /\ Y C_ A ) /\ ( Q e. X /\ R e. Y ) /\ ( S e. A /\ S .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) -> S e. ( X .+ Y ) ) $.
